Blog

All pages on this site are licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution 4.0 International License.

You are free to:

 

Share — copy and redistribute the material in any medium or format
Adapt — remix, transform, and build upon the material for any purpose, even commercially.

I can’t revoke these freedoms as long as you follow the license terms:

Attribution — You must give appropriate credit, provide a link to the license, and indicate if changes were made. You may do so in any reasonable manner, but not in any way that suggests the licensor endorses you or your use.

Code

Typically, all my source code is licensed under a GPLv3 license. This might be different depending on the project. Please consult the COPYING file in the project’s repository of your interest.

Have any questions?

Feel free to contact me!
